text: læa doy nænxn rea di sng rx su lma nı thuk prachachati (doy baycha wa) “phwk tha cng khea rph phakdi xallxh læa cng hlik hni hı hang cak phwk cewd” dangnan nı hmu phwk khea mi phu thi xallxh thrng chinæa thang hı læa nı hmu phwk khea mi kar hlng phid khukhwr kæ khea chanan phwk cea cng trawen pi nı phændin læw cng du wa banplay khxng phu ptiseth nan pen chen dı
